basics.name: Jane Doe
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Experienced Frontend Developer with a strong foundation in web development and full-stack capabilities. Specializing in building scalable, maintainable web applications using modern technologies and best practices. Focused on creating reliable components while ensuring high-quality code and seamless user experience.

work.name: Company 1
work.summary: Lead frontend developer responsible for architecture decisions and team mentorship.
highlights: Architected and implemented scalable frontend solutions using reusable component patterns and modern best practices
Led code quality initiatives through comprehensive code reviews and implementation of development standards
Collaborated closely with design team to ensure pixel-perfect implementation while maintaining optimal functionality
Improved platform performance by 40% through optimization and modern development practices
Mentored junior developers and conducted technical knowledge sharing sessions to improve team capabilities

work.name: Company 2
work.summary: Full-stack developer working on enterprise web applications.
highlights: Developed and maintained web applications using SharePoint, Drupal 8, and Episerver
Led a team of 10 frontend developers, providing technical guidance and project support
Maintained clear communication with Project Manager and IT Leads regarding project progress

work.name: Company 3
work.summary: Frontend developer focused on web platforms and custom solutions.
highlights: Designed and implemented user-friendly interfaces for small business digital platforms
Developed custom WordPress themes and plugins, providing client training and support
Maintained and optimized web platforms for improved performance
Integrated third-party services including payment gateways and shipping providers
Customized and enhanced themes to meet client requirements

activities.achievements:
• Awarded 'Best Frontend Developer' at Company Hackathon 2023
• Led successful migration of legacy codebase to modern React architecture
• Reduced application load time by 45% through performance optimizations
activities.involvements:
• Active contributor to open-source React component libraries
• Regular speaker at local JavaScript meetups
• Mentor for junior developers through company mentorship program
